title: Kaia Gerber steps out for dinner with a male pal in West Hollywood.
text:
She was busy at Paris Fashion Week less than a week ago where she modeled for Chanel.

And Kaia Gerber donned a subtler look than her catwalk collections as she stepped out for dinner with a male pal on Thursday night in Los Angeles.

The 18-year-old daughter of Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber wore a rust-colored blazer with medium wash jeans in a straight leg cut.

In good company: Kaia Gerber donned a subtler look than her catwalk collections as she stepped out for dinner with a male pal on Thursday night

Out and about: The 18-year-old model wore a rust-colored blazer with medium wash jeans in a straight leg cut

Her feet navigated the pavement in black strappy heels and wore her short, choppy hair in a half-up, half-down 'do.

She kept her makeup minimal with a swipe of clear gloss on the lips and some pink-tinted eyeshadow.

The sighting comes almost a week after Kaia strutted the runway for Valentino at Paris Fashion Week.

She did so in an ultra-sheer black blouse with a pussy-bow at the top.

Busy: She kept her makeup minimal with a swipe of clear gloss on the lips and some pink-tinted eye shadow

The elegant top was paired with a pencil skirt and a pair of lace-up sandals with attached fringe.

Her career first began after Donatella Versace took notice of her talent at just 10 years old and cast her in a photo shoot for Versace's junior line, Young Versace.

Cindy explained to Destinations of the World News last year in a dual interview with Kaia: 'We allowed her to do it because it was with a great team.

'She loved shooting for Donatella Versace with Mert and Markus. I chaperoned her, and I knew besides getting great pictures, she would have fun.'

Posh: The star walked the Valentino runway in Paris on September 29 in an ultra-sheer black blouse with a pussy-bow at the top

She lit up the runway: Here the model is seen at the Chanel show on Tuesday in Paris

Of the opportunities and partnerships coming her way, Kaia told the outlet: 'I’ve been so lucky to work with such incredible people so early on in my career and I hope it’s just the beginning.

'My goal is to continue down the same road, work with even more amazing people and build lasting relationships.'

And even as she gets older, she's open to advice from her mother Cindy, whose star shined brightest in the industry back in the 1980s and 1990s.

'My parents have always taught me to be myself and to follow my instincts,' she told the outlet.

'They also say that you should never let what other people do affect what you want to do. It changes everything when you accept who you are, and you don’t try to change yourself.'
description: She was busy at Paris Fashion Week less than a week ago. And Kaia Gerber donned a subtler look than her catwalk collections as she stepped out for dinner with a male pal on Thursday night.
